dialogue.introduction: Fourth ship of the Myoukou-class heavy cruisers, Haguro. Together with everyone, I will support the front lines!
dialogue.library_intro: I was born in Nagasaki. I participated in many battles, in the Battle of the Java Sea, the Battle of the Coral Sea, the Battle of Midway, the Battle of the Eastern Solomons, and the Battle of the Philippine Sea. Um... I try my best!
dialogue.secretary2: Commander? ... It's all right, I'm good!
dialogue.secretary3: Um... excuse me... Is this some new way of communication?
dialogue.secretaryidle: E, excuse me, commander…? Haguro is waiting for you here in case of trouble...
dialogue.secretarymarried: Commander… I hope this war will be over and the sea will get quiet. I pray for it. Commander… you will surely…
dialogue.wedding: After this battle is over… T-together with the Commander..! Erm.. Ummm.. Errrmm…
dialogue.joining_a_fleet: Haguro of The Fifth Squadron, heading out!
dialogue.equipment1: I will cherish the equipment I've received.
dialogue.equipment2: Please remodel... the other girls first.
dialogue.supply: I… I'm receiving it, thank you.
dialogue.docking_minor_damage: The other girls (ships) should go first.
dialogue.docking_moderate_damage: Okay. Any more and I would have sunk instantly back there.
dialogue.docking_complete: Um... The ship repair.. has been finished.
dialogue.ship_construction: It seems a new comrade has been launched.
dialogue.return_from_sortie: The battle is complete... Um... Just reporting...
dialogue.attack: Even if there are five times the enemies...I will fight them all!
dialogue.mvp: As it is, it would be better if all the fighting could end.
dialogue.minor_damaged2: I'm hit...second turret!?...I can still continue!
dialogue.sunk: The other girls (ships), could they manage to hold on... Ah, no more, I can't see any more...
dialogue.white_day_2015: What? These lovely cookies, for me!? Mr.Commander... Really... thank you very much! (Cries)
dialogue.second_anniversary_2015: Commander, it's the two years anniversary! I truly thank you! Haguro is happy too!
dialogue.midsummer_2015: This is summer now...Huh? Why I am not going to swim? Because I don't have a swimsuit...erm...um...wha-what!?
dialogue.fall_2015: Autumn... is peaceful, isn't it? I like this season. What about you, admiral?
dialogue.christmas_2015: Sir commander... Merry Christmas. Uh... Uhm... A present... If you like it... Uhm...
dialogue.new_year_2016: Happy New Year! I'll be in your care this year as well.
dialogue.setsubun_2016: Commander. It's Setsubun. Umm.., Would you like me to be the Demon? Eh? But that's...
